description:
Stay active on the trail and introduce your little one to nature. The Kid Comfort Active Carrier is comfortable for both passenger and parent. The ventilated back system lets air flow easily, and can be easily adjusted to fit parents of different heights. Lots of pockets let you store everything you need for a full day outside.

  • Minimalist Lite Air System back panel connects directly to the frame for great load transfer
  • PullForward hip belt is easy to adjust, even with heavy loads
  • Perforated shoulder straps, load lifter straps and adjustable chest strap provide a comfortable fit
  • Height-adjustable child seat and foot rests can be adapted for growing kids
  • Colour coordinated child safety harness is easy to use
  • Child cockpit area has ventilated mesh sides, a detachable and washable chin pillow, soft fabric around the face and durable washable fabric by the feet
  • Sturdy aluminum frame is tip-resistant, has a locking base and folds for transport
  • Large mesh pocket under the child seat, large stretch front pocket and a zippered hip pocket
name: Deuter Kid Comfort Active Carrier - Infants
